table.pyName: (select t.*,a.jgbh,a.jgmc from T_SYS_BMXX t left join T_SYS_JGXX a on a.jgxxid=t.jgxxid and a.delflag=0 and t.delflag=0)
(select a.ZTBH, a.ZTXXID,a.ZTMC,a.ZTLB,a.SJZT,a.STATE,b.ZTMC SJZTMC from T_SYS_ZTXX a left join T_SYS_ZTXX b on a.SJZT=b.ZTXXID)

(select a.*, b.XM,b.ZW,c.jgmc,d.bmmc from T_SYS_XTYH a left join T_SYS_RYXX b on a.RYXXID = b.RYXXID and ryzt='启用' left join T_SYS_JGXX c on a.jgxxid = c.jgxxid and c.delflag=0 LEFT JOIN T_SYS_BMXX d on a.bmxxid = d.bmxxid and d.bmzt='启用' and d.delflag=0 where a.yhzt='启用' and a.delflag=0) TEMP
(SELECT U.BMXXID,U.BMMC,U.BMBH,U.JGXXID,U.ZTXXID,J.JGBH,J.JGMC,U.BMJC,U.BMZT FROM T_SYS_BMXX U LEFT JOIN T_SYS_JGXX J ON U.JGXXID=J.JGXXID WHERE U.DELFLAG = 0) temp

(select a.ryxxid,a.rybh,a.xm,a.zw,c.bmxxid,c.bmbh,c.bmmc,b.jgxxid,b.jgbh,b.jgmc,b.ztxxid from (select * from T_SYS_RYXX where ryzt='启用' and delflag=0) a left join (select * from T_SYS_JGXX where jgzt='启用' and delflag=0) b on a.jgxxid=b.jgxxid left join (select * from T_SYS_BMXX where bmzt='启用' and delflag=0) c on a.bmxxid=c.bmxxid) temp

(select STORE_ID,STORE_NO ,STORE_TYPE,STORE_NAME,DTL_ADDR,STORAGE_FLAG,STATE,DEL_FLAG,BEL_CHANN_ID,BEL_CHANN_NAME,FREEZE_FLAG,LEDGER_ID,TERM_STROE_FLAG, ( case when STORAGE_FLAG=1 then '是' else '否' end) as STORAGE_FLAG_ZN from DRP_STORE) temp

(select u.STOREIN_ID, u.STOREIN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_ID, u.SEND_CHANN_NO, u.SEND_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.STOREIN_STORE_ID, u.STOREIN_STORE_NO, u.STOREIN_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.DEAL_FLAG, to_char(u.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEAL_TIME, u.DEAL_PSON_ID, u.DEAL_PSON_NAME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_STOREIN u) demp
(select * from DRP_STOREIN_DTL where DEL_FLAG = 0)

( select PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, SPCL_TECH_ID, SPCL_TECH_FLAG, DECT_PRICE, MAX_RETURN_NUM, temp.STORE_ID, temp.STOREIN_ID, (PRD_ID || SPCL_TECH_ID)CHECKONLY from DRP_STORE x left join (select u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, u.DECT_PRICE, k.STORE_ID, k.STORE_NO, k.STORE_NAME, k.STORE_TYPE, NVL(k.MAX_RETURN_NUM, 0) MAX_RETURN_NUM, u.STOREIN_ID from (select b.PRD_ID, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.PRD_COLOR, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, b.SPCL_TECH_ID, c.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, b.DECT_PRICE, a.STOREIN_STORE_ID, a.STOREIN_ID from DRP_STOREIN a left join DRP_STOREIN_DTL b on a.STOREIN_ID = b.STOREIN_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on NVL(c.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NONE') = NVL(b.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NONE') where b.DEL_FLAG = 0) u left join (select a.PRD_ID, b.STORE_ID, b.STORE_NO, b.STORE_NAME, b.STORE_TYPE, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, sum(NVL(STORE_NUM, 0) - NVL(FREEZE_NUM, 0)) MAX_RETURN_NUM from DRP_STORE_ACCT a, DRP_STORE b where a.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID group by PRD_ID, b.STORE_ID, b.STORE_NO, b.STORE_NAME, b.STORE_TYPE, a.SPCL_TECH_ID) k on u.PRD_ID = k.PRD_ID and NVL(k.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NONE') = NVL(u.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NONE') and u.STOREIN_STORE_ID = k.STORE_ID ) temp on x.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID
)

( select a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, a.DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.FREEZE_NUM, a.IS_FREEZE_FLAG, a.FREEZE_STORE_ID, a.SEND_NUM, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRD_TYPE, a.REMARK, (NVL(ORDER_NUM,0)-NVL((select sum(NVL(b.NOTICE_NUM,0)) from DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ_DTL b left join DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ c on c.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID = b.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID where c.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.STATE!='已取消' and b.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID=a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID),0)) NUM from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=b.SPCL_TECH_ID and b.USE_FLAG=1 )
(select * from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL where DEL_FLAG = 0)

(select STATEMENTS_NO,SALE_PSON_NAME,SALE_DATE,CUST_NAME,TEL,LEDGER_ID,TERM_NAME,BILL_TYPE from DRP_STATEMENTS where DEL_FLAG=0)
(select STATEMENTS_NO,SALE_PSON_NAME,SALE_DATE,CUST_NAME,TEL,LEDGER_ID,TERM_NAME,BILL_TYPE from DRP_STATEMENTS where DEL_FLAG=0)

(select b.BILL_TYPE, b.ADVC_ORDER_ID, b.ADVC_ORDER_NO, a.STOREIN_ID, a.STOREIN_NO, to_char(a.DEAL_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:Mi:ss') DEAL_TIME, b.TERM_ID, b.TERM_NO, b.TERM_NAME, b.SALE_PSON_NAME, b.SALE_DATE, b.CUST_NAME, b.TEL, b.ADVC_AMOUNT, b.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, b.ADD_ADVC_AMOUNT, (b.PAYABLE_AMOUNT-b.ADVC_AMOUNT-b.ADD_ADVC_AMOUNT) LAST_AMOUNT, b.DEL_FLAG, b.STATE, a.LEDGER_ID from DRP_STOREIN a left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER b on a.FROM_BILL_ID = b.ADVC_ORDER_ID where a.BILL_TYPE = '终端退货' and a.STATE='已处理' and a.DEL_FLAG='0')

( select a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.VOLUME, a.FINAL_NODE_FLAG, a.STATE, a.DEL_FLAG, a.COMM_FLAG, decode(NVL(b.PRMT_PRVD_PRICE, 0), 0, NVL(a.PRVD_PRICE, 0), NVL(b.PRMT_PRVD_PRICE, 0)) PRVD_PRICE, a.PAR_PRD_NO, a.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, NVL(a.PRD_SUIT_FLAG,0)PRD_SUIT_FLAG, IS_CAN_FREE_FLAG from BASE_PRODUCT a left join ERP_PRMT_PRICE b on a.PRD_ID=b.PRD_ID and b.EFFCT_DATE_BEG <= sysdate and b.EFFCT_DATE_END >= sysdate and b.STATE='启用' )

(select a.*, b.XM,b.ZW,c.jgmc,d.bmmc from T_SYS_XTYH a left join T_SYS_RYXX b on a.RYXXID = b.RYXXID and ryzt='启用' left join T_SYS_JGXX c on a.jgxxid = c.jgxxid and c.delflag=0 LEFT JOIN T_SYS_BMXX d on a.bmxxid = d.bmxxid and d.bmzt='启用' and d.delflag=0 where a.yhzt='启用' and a.delflag=0) TEMP

ORDER_CHANN_ID, E.ORDER_CHANN_NO ORDER_CHANN_NO, E.ORDER_CHANN_NAME ORDER_CHANN_NAME, to_char(E.ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER_DATE, E.CHANN_ID CHANN_ID, E.CHANN_NO CHANN_NO, E.CHANN_NAME CHANN_NAME, E.PRINT_NAME PRINT_NAME, E.TRANSPORT TRANSPORT, E.TRANSPORT_SETTLE TRANSPORT_SETTLE, E.FACTORY_NO FACTORY_NO, E.PROESS_TYPE PROESS_TYPE, E.SALE_ID SALE_ID, E.SALE_NAME SALE_NAME, E.SALEDEPT_NAME SALEDEPT_NAME, E.SALEDEPT_ID SALEDEPT_ID, to_char(E.PRE_RECV_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PRE_RECV_DATE, E.CUST_NAME CUST_NAME, E.IS_USE_REBATE IS_USE_REBATE, E.RECV_CHANN_ID RECV_CHANN_ID, E.RECV_CHANN_NO RECV_CHANN_NO, E.RECV_CHANN_NAME RECV_CHANN_NAME, E.PERSON_CON PERSON_CON, E.RECV_ADDR RECV_ADDR, E.RECV_ADDR_NO RECV_ADDR_NO, E.TEL TEL, E.STATE STATE, E.REMARK REMARK, E.REMARK2 REMARK2, E.CREATOR CREATOR, E.CRE_NAME CRE_NAME, to_char(E.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') CRE_TIME, E.UPDATOR UPDATOR, E.UPD_NAME UPD_NAME, to_char(E.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') UPD_TIME, E.LEDGER_NAME LEDGER_NAME, E.LEDGER_ID LEDGER_ID, E.DEL_FLAG DEL_FLAG, E.AUDIT_TIME AUDIT_TIME, E.AUDIT_NAME AUDIT_NAME, E.AUDIT_ID AUDIT_ID, E.DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME, E.DEPT_ID DEPT_ID, E.ORG_ID ORG_ID, E.ORG_NAME ORG_NAME, E.AREA_ID AREA_ID, E.AREA_NO AREA_NO, E.AREA_NAME AREA_NAME, E.BASE_ADD_FLAG BASE_ADD_FLAG, to_char(E.ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE, E.CUST_TEL CUST_TEL, E.CUST_ADDR CUST_ADDR, E.ORDER_TRACE_ID ORDER_TRACE_ID, E.RETURN_SHOW_FLAG RETURN_SHOW_FLAG, E.PROBLEM_FEEDBACK_ID PROBLEM_FEEDBACK_ID, E.PROBLEM_FEEDBACK_NO PROBLEM_FEEDBACK_NO, E.CHANGE_FLAG CHANGE_FLAG, E.TOTAL_AMOUNT TOTAL_AMOUNT, E.TOTAL_REBATE TOTAL_REBATE, E.NC_ID NC_ID, A.CHANN_ID CHANN_ID2, A.USER_ID USER_ID, B.XTYHID XTYHID, B.LEDGER_ID LEDGER_ID2 FROM ERP_SALE_ORDER E LEFT JOIN BASE_USER_CHANN_CHRG A ON E.CHANN_ID = A.CHANN_ID LEFT JOIN BASE_XTYH_LEDGER_CHRG B ON E.LEDGER_ID = B.LEDGER_ID WHERE E.CHANGE_FLAG != '1' AND E.DEL_FLAG = 0 )

(select distinct pro.*,sto.store_id ,sto.store_num,sto.freeze_num,c.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, (NVL(sto.store_num,0)-NVL(sto.freeze_num,0)) safe_num, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, c.SPCL_TECH_FLAG,sto.ledger_id STOLEDGER,pro.ledger_id PROLEDGER from Base_Product pro inner join DRP_STORE_ACCT sto on sto.prd_id=pro.prd_id left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on c.SPCL_TECH_ID = sto.SPCL_TECH_ID where sto.state=0 ) TEMP

table.pyName: (select a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, a.DECT_PRICE, NVL(a.ORDER_NUM,0) ORDER_NUM, a.ORDER_AMOUNT, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.SALE_ORDER_ID, NVL(a.SENDED_NUM,0) SENDED_NUM, a.DEL_FLAG, (NVL(acct.STORE_NUM,0)-NVL(acct.FREEZE_NUM,0)) STORE_NUM, acct.STORE_ID, NVL(a.STORED_NUM,0) STORED_NUM from DRP_SALE_ORDER_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=b.SPCL_TECH_ID and USE_FLAG=1 left join DRP_STORE_ACCT acct on a.PRD_ID=acct.PRD_ID and (( a.SPCL_TECH_ID is not null and a.SPCL_TECH_ID = acct.SPCL_TECH_ID) or acct.SPCL_TECH_ID is null) )

( select DISTINCT t.TERM_ID,t.TERM_NO,t.TERM_NAME,t.TERM_TYPE,t.chann_id_p CHANN_ID, t.chann_no_p CHANN_NO, t.chann_name_p CHANN_NAME, t.PERSON_CON,t.TEL,t.mobile_phone MOBILE,t.ADDRESS, t.ZONE_ID,t.DEL_FLAG, t.STATE, t.BUSS_AREA,t.AREA_ID,t.AREA_NO,t.AREA_NAME,t.SALE_STORE_ID,t.SALE_STORE_NAME,t.LOCAL_TYPE,t.BUSS_SCOPE, c.person_con CHANN_PERSON_CON, c.tel CHANN_TEL,t.BEG_SBUSS_DATE, (t.nation || t.prov || t.city) ZONE_ADDR,t.TAX, t.BUSS_NATRUE,t.TERM_VERSION, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME AREA_MANAGE_NAME,c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL AREA_MANAGE_TEL,c.AREA_MANAGE_ID AREA_MANAGE_ID from base_terminal t left join base_chann c on c.chann_id = t.chann_id_p )

(select t.TERM_ID, t.TERM_NO, t.TERM_NAME, t.TERM_ABBR, t.TERM_TYPE, t.TERM_LVL, t.CHANN_ID_P, t.CHANN_NO_P, t.CHANN_NAME_P, b.PERSON_CON, b.TEL, t.AREA_NO, t.AREA_NAME, t.SALE_STORE_NAME, t.ADDRESS from base_terminal t left join base_chann b on b.chann_id = t.CHANN_NO_P )

( select DISTINCT d.RNVTN_CHECK_ID, d.RNVTN_CHECK_NO, d.CHANN_RNVTN_ID, d.CHANN_RNVTN_NO, d.RNVTN_PRINCIPAL, d.RNVTN_CHECK_DATE, d.TERM_ID, d.TERM_NO, d.TERM_NAME, d.RNVTN_PROP, d.PLAN_SBUSS_DATE, d.SALE_STORE_ID, d.SALE_STORE_NAME, d.LOCAL_TYPE, c.BUSS_SCOPE, c.USE_AREA, c.CHANN_ID from DRP_RNVTN_CHECK d left join DRP_CHANN_RNVTN c on c.chann_rnvtn_no = d.chann_rnvtn_no where d.state = '验收完成' )

(select r.RYXXID, r.RYBH, r.XM, r.XB, r.SFZH, r.ZW, r.GSDH, r.SJ, r.DZYJ, r.RYZT, r.RYJB, r.BMXXID, b.BMBH, b.BMMC, j.ZTXXID, j.JGXXID, j.JGBH, j.JGMC, r.DELFLAG, r.RYLB, r.RYSM, r.CREATER, r.CRENAME, to_char(r.CRETIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRETIME from T_SYS_RYXX r left join T_SYS_BMXX b on r.BMXXID = b.BMXXID left join T_SYS_JGXX j on r.JGXXID = j.JGXXID where r.DELFLAG = 0 ) temp

( select t.DATA_DTL_ID, t.DATA_DTL_NAME, t.PAR_DATA_DTL_ID, t.PAR_DATA_DTL_NAME, t.DATA_DTL_DES_1 from project_data_dictionary_dtl t where t.data_id in (select p.data_id from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY p where p.data_name = '装修验收项目') and t.data_dtl_id not in (select d.PAR_DATA_DTL_ID from project_data_dictionary_dtl d where d.par_data_dtl_id is not null) )

( select distinct c.DATA_DTL_ID, c.DATA_ID,c.DATA_DTL_NAME,b.DATA_NAME,b.STATE,c.DELFLAG,c.PAR_DATA_DTL_NAME,c.DATA_DTL_DES_1 from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL c left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY b on c.data_id=b.DATA_ID and b.DELFLAG=0 and STATE='启用' where c.DELFLAG=0 and b.DATA_NAME='装修验收项目' )

( select b.STATE, b.CHANN_ID, b.CHANN_NO, b.CHANN_NAME, b.PERSON_CON, b.TEL, b.AREA_ID, b.AREA_NO, b.AREA_NAME, b.AREA_MANAGE_ID, b.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, b.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, b.NATION, b.PROV, b.CITY from BASE_CHANN b where b.del_flag=0 )

( select t.TERM_ID, t.TERM_NO, t.TERM_NAME, t.TERM_TYPE, b.CHANN_ID, b.CHANN_NO, b.CHANN_NAME, b.PERSON_CON, b.TEL, t.AREA_ID, t.AREA_NO, t.AREA_NAME, t.BUSS_AREA, b.AREA_MANAGE_ID, b.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, b.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, b.NATION, b.PROV, b.CITY from base_terminal t left join base_chann b on b.chann_id = t.CHANN_NO_P where t.del_flag=0 and b.del_flag=0 )

( select e.ERP_ADV_REQ_ID, e.ERP_ADV_REQ_NO, e.CHANN_ID, e.CHANN_NO, e.CHANN_NAME, e.AREA_ID, e.AREA_NO, e.AREA_NAME, e.AREA_MANAGE_ID, e.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, e.CHANN_RANK, e.ADV_CO_NAME, e.ADV_CO_CONTACT, e.ADV_CO_TEL, e.ADV_CONTENT, e.ADV_ADDR, e.ADV_TOTAL_AMOUNT, b.ATT_PATH from ERP_ADV_REQ e left join BASE_ATT b on b.from_bill_id = e.erp_adv_req_id where e.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 )
table.lgName: 广告投放报销申请单维护

table.pyName: (select a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.ADVC_ORDER_NO,a.BILL_TYPE,a.STATE,a.DEL_FLAG,a.LEDGER_ID, a.TERM_ID,a.TERM_NO,a.TERM_NAME, a.SALE_DATE,a.SALE_PSON_ID,a.SALE_PSON_NAME,a.CUST_NAME,a.TEL,a.ORDER_RECV_DATE,a.ADVC_AMOUNT,a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT,a.DEDUCTED_TOTAL_AMOUNT,a.RECV_ADDR,abs(a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT)PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT_TEMP from DRP_ADVC_ORDER a left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER b on a.FROM_BILL_ID = b.ADVC_ORDER_ID )
( select a.SJXMC,a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG=0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE='启用' and u.SJZDBH='ERP_SALE_SATE') temp

(select u.GOODS_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.GOODS_ORDER_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.ORDER_NUM, u.ORDER_AMOUNT, u.REMARK, u.SESSION_ID, u.TECH_PRICE_MULT, u.DEL_FLAG, u.OLD_PRICE, u.VOLUME, u.CREDIT_FREEZE_PRICE, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, u.total_volume from DRP_GOODS_ORDER_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = a.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG = 1) temp

( select a.SALE_ORDER_NO, a.FROM_BILL_NO, a.BILL_TYPE, a.ORDER_CHANN_NO, a.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, a.RECV_ADDR_NO, a.RECV_CHANN_ID, a.RECV_CHANN_NO, a.RECV_CHANN_NAME, (case when b.IS_FREE_FLAG=1 then '是' else '否' end)IS_FREE_FLAG, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, c.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK SPCL_DTL_REMARK, b.ORDER_NUM, b.SENDED_NUM, (NVL(b.ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(b.SENDED_NUM, 0)) NO_SEND_NUM, e.PLAN_NUM, a.SALE_ORDER_ID, b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, b.PRD_ID, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, a.ORDER_CHANN_ID, a.RECV_ADDR, b.VOLUME, g.SHIP_POINT_NAME, g.SHIP_POINT_NO, g.SHIP_POINT_ID, b.DECT_PRICE, to_char(b.ADVC_SEND_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ADVC_SEND_DATE from ERP_SALE_ORDER a left join ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL b on a.SALE_ORDER_ID = b.SALE_ORDER_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on b.SPCl_TECH_ID = c.SPCL_TECH_ID left join (select d.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID, sum(d.PLAN_NUM) PLAN_NUM from ERP_DELIVER_ORDER_DTL d where d.IS_SEND_FIN = 0 and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID) e on b.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID = e.SALE_ORDER_DTL_ID left join BASE_PRODUCT f on f.PRD_ID=b.PRD_ID left join BASE_SHIP_POINT g on g.SHIP_POINT_ID=a.SHIP_POINT_ID where NVL(b.ORDER_NUM,0) > NVL(b.SENDED_NUM,0) and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.STATE='正常' and a.STATE='待发货' )
table.lgName: 出货计划维护明细新增

table.pyName: (select WRITE_OFF_DTL_ID, STATEMENTS_PAYMENT_DTL_ID, PAY_TYPE, PAY_BILL_NO, DEL_FLAG, WRITE_OFF_PSON_ID, WRITE_OFF_PSON_NAME, to_char(WRITE_OFF_PSON_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')WRITE_OFF_PSON_TIME, WRITE_OFF_AMONT from DRP_WRITE_OFF_DTL)
(select DATA_CONF_ID,DATA_NAME,DATA_TYPE,DATA_VAL, DEL_FLAG,LEDGER_ID,IS_DEAL_FLAG from DRP_DATA_CONF where DATA_TYPE = '付款方式')

( select p.PRD_ID, p.PRD_NO, p.PRD_NAME, p.PRD_SPEC, p.STD_UNIT, p.BRAND, p.PAR_PRD_NO, p.PAR_PRD_NAME, (case when u.RETAL_PRICE_ID is null then p.FACT_PRICE else u.FACT_PRICE end) FACT_PRICE, p.PRD_COLOR, p.VOLUME, NVL(k.storeNUM, 0) STORENUM, m.ZTXXID, p.STATE, NVL(d.NOSENDNUM, 0) NOSENDNUM from T_SYS_ZTXX m left join BASE_PRODUCT p on ((m.ZTXXID = p.LEDGER_ID and p.state='启用') or p.COMM_FLAG = 1) and p.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG = 0 and p.DEL_FLAG = 0 and p.STATE in ('启用','停用') and p.FINAL_NODE_FLAG = 1 and NVL(p.PRD_SUIT_FLAG, 0) = 0 left join DRP_RETAL_PRICE u on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID and m.ZTXXID = u.LEDGER_ID and u.DEL_FLAG = 0 left join (select PRD_ID, LEDGER_ID, sum(NVL(a.STORE_NUM, 0) - NVL(a.FREEZE_NUM, 0)) STORENUM from DRP_STORE_ACCT a where a.SPCL_TECH_ID is null group by PRD_ID, LEDGER_ID) k on k.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID and m.ZTXXID = k.LEDGER_ID left join (select c.PRD_ID, b.LEDGER_ID, sum(NVL(c.ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(c.SEND_NUM, 0)) NOSENDNUM from DRP_ADVC_ORDER b left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL c on b.ADVC_ORDER_ID = c.ADVC_ORDER_ID and c.DEL_FLAG = 0 where b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and c.STATE = '正常' and c.SPCL_TECH_ID is null group by c.PRD_ID, b.LEDGER_ID) d on d.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID and m.ZTXXID = d.LEDGER_ID )
( SELECT s.RYXXID ,s.RYBH,s.XM TNAME,b.BMBH,b.BMMC FROM T_SYS_RYXX s left join T_SYS_BMXX b on s.bmxxid = b.bmxxid where s.delflag = 0 and b.delflag=0 )

( select a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, decode(a.PRD_TYPE,'销售货品',a.DECT_PRICE,0)DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, decode(a.PRD_TYPE,'销售货品',a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT,0)PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.FREEZE_NUM, a.IS_FREEZE_FLAG, a.FREEZE_STORE_ID, a.SEND_NUM, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRD_TYPE, sum(c.REAL_NUM)REAL_NUM, b.SPCL_DTL_REMARK from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=b.SPCL_TECH_ID and b.USE_FLAG=1 left join DRP_DST_STOREOUT_DTL c on c.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID=a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID and c.DEL_FLAG=0 group by a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, a.DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.FREEZE_NUM, a.IS_FREEZE_FLAG, a.FREEZE_STORE_ID, a.SEND_NUM, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRD_TYPE, b.SPCL_DTL_REMARK having sum(NVL(c.REAL_NUM, 0)) > 0 )
( select a.SJXMC,a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG=0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE='启用' and u.SJZDBH='NEW_ERP_SALE_SATE') temp
( select a.SJXMC,a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG=0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE='启用' and u.SJZDBH='SYS_NOTICE_OBJ') temp

( select p.PRD_ID, p.PRD_NO, p.PRD_NAME, p.PRD_SPEC, p.STD_UNIT, p.BRAND, (case when u.RETAL_PRICE_ID is null then p.FACT_PRICE else u.FACT_PRICE end) FACT_PRICE, p.PRD_COLOR, p.VOLUME, '' PRD_TYPE, a.ZTXXID from T_SYS_ZTXX a left join BASE_PRODUCT p on (p.COMM_FLAG=1 or (p.COMM_FLAG=0 and p.LEDGER_ID=a.ztxxid)) and p.DEL_FLAG=0 and p.STATE in('启用','停用') and p.FINAL_NODE_FLAG=1 left join DRP_RETAL_PRICE u on u.PRD_ID=p.PRD_ID and u.DEL_FLAG = 0 and u.LEDGER_ID=a.ZTXXID )

(select distinct pro.*,sto.STORE_ID ,sto.STORE_NUM,sto.FREEZE_NUM,c.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, (NVL(sto.STORE_NUM,0)-NVL(sto.FREEZE_NUM,0)) SAFE_NUM,c.SPCL_TECH_NO,c.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, c.SPCL_TECH_FLAG,sto.LEDGER_ID STOLEDGER,pro.LEDGER_ID PROLEDGER from DRP_STORE_ACCT sto left join BASE_PRODUCT pro on sto.PRD_ID=pro.PRD_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on c.SPCL_TECH_ID = sto.SPCL_TECH_ID where sto.STATE=0 ) TEMP
PS:动态表

( select a.DUMP_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.BRAND, a.DUMP_NUM, a.REMARK, b.SPCL_DTL_REMARK from DRP_DUMP_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=b.SPCL_TECH_ID and b.USE_FLAG=1 where a.DEL_FLAG = 0 )

( select DISTINCT t.TERM_ID, t.TERM_NO, t.TERM_NAME, t.TERM_TYPE, t.chann_id_p CHANN_ID, t.chann_no_p CHANN_NO, t.chann_name_p CHANN_NAME, t.TERM_ABBR, t.TERM_LVL, t.BUSS_NATRUE, t.LOGIC_TYPE, t.AREA_ID, t.AREA_NO, t.AREA_NAME, t.ZONE_ID, t.NATION, t.PROV, t.CITY, t.COUNTY, t.CITY_TYPE, t.PERSON_CON, t.TEL, t.mobile_phone MOBILE, t.TAX, t.POST, t.ADDRESS, t.EMAIL, t.WEB, t.LEGAL_REPRE, t.BUSS_LIC, t.AX_BURDEN, t.ORG_CODE_CERT, t.BUSS_SCOPE, t.FI_CMP_NO, t.BUSS_AREA, t.STOR_NO, to_char(t.LAST_DECOR_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LAST_DECOR_TIME, t.SALE_STORE_ID, t.SALE_STORE_NAME, t.DEL_FLAG, t.STATE, p.DATA_DTL_CODE LOCAL_TYPE, t.BEG_SBUSS_DATE,t.PLAY_BANK_NAME,t.PLAY_BANK_ACCT,t.BUSS_STATE,t.TERM_VERSION,t.BEG_BUSS_TYPE from base_terminal t left join base_chann c on c.chann_id = t.chann_id_p left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL p on t.local_type = p.data_dtl_name )

( select a.COST_PRICE_ID, a.PRD_ID, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.MONTH, a.YEAR, a.COST_PRICE, a.LEDGER_ID, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.STD_UNIT, c.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, c.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, c.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, 0 ADJUST_AMOUNT, (a.PRD_ID || c.SPCL_TECH_ID)CHECKONLY from DRP_COST_PRICE a left join BASE_PRODUCT b on a.PRD_ID = b.PRD_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on NVL(c.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NONE') = NVL(a.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NONE') and c.USE_FLAG = 1 )

(select c.CHANN_ID,c.CHANN_NO,c.CHANN_NAME,c.AREA_ID,c.AREA_NO,c.AREA_NAME, a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P,a.AREA_NAME_P,c.STATE,c.DEL_FLAG,c.AREA_MANAGE_ID,c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME,c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL from BASE_CHANN c left join BASE_AREA a on a.AREA_ID=c.AREA_ID where a.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.STATE='启用' and c.DEL_FLAG=0 )
(select a.AREA_ID WAREA_ID,a.AREA_NO WAREA_NO,a.AREA_NAME WAREA_NAME,a.STATE,a.DEL_FLAG from BASE_AREA a where a.AREA_ID_P is null)

( select DISTINCT area.AREA_ID,area.AREA_NO,area.AREA_NAME, area.AREA_ID_P,area.AREA_NO_P,area.AREA_NAME_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID,c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME from base_area area left join BASE_CHANN c on area.AREA_ID = c.AREA_ID where area.del_flag = 0 and area.state = '启用' and area.AREA_ID_P is not null )
( select a.SJXMC,a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG=0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE='启用' and u.SJZDBH='SJZD0002') temp
( select a.SJXMC,a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG=0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE='启用' and u.SJZDBH='MONTH_SALECT') temp
(select distinct CITY,PROV,DEL_FLAG from BASE_ZONE) temp
(select BRAND_ID ID, BRAND BRNAME,BRAND_EN BRNAME_EN,STATE,DEL_FLAG from BASE_BRAND)temp

( select DISTINCT a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P,a.AREA_NAME_P,c.RYBH,c.XM,c.RYXXID from base_area a left join base_chann b on a.area_id=b.area_id left join t_sys_ryxx c on b.chann_id=c.jgxxid where a.state='启用' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.state='启用'and b.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.DELFLAG=0
)
( select DISTINCT area.AREA_ID_P,area.AREA_NO_P,area.AREA_NAME_P from base_area area where area.del_flag = 0 and area.state = '启用' and area.AREA_ID_P is not null )
(SELECT DISTINCT U.ZONE_ID,U.PROV,U.NATION,U.CITY FROM BASE_ZONE U WHERE U.DEL_FLAG = 0) temp

( select a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.VOLUME, a.FINAL_NODE_FLAG, a.STATE, a.DEL_FLAG, a.COMM_FLAG, decode(NVL(b.PRMT_PRVD_PRICE,0),0,NVL(a.PRVD_PRICE, 0),NVL(b.PRMT_PRVD_PRICE,0)) PRVD_PRICE, a.PAR_PRD_NO, a.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG, NVL(a.PRD_SUIT_FLAG,0)PRD_SUIT_FLAG, a.IS_CAN_FREE_FLAG, a.IS_REBATE_FLAG from BASE_PRODUCT a left join ERP_PRMT_PRICE b on a.PRD_ID=b.PRD_ID and b.EFFCT_DATE_BEG <= sysdate and b.EFFCT_DATE_END >= sysdate and b.STATE='启用' )
( select b.BMXXID,b.BMBH,b.BMMC from t_sys_bmxx b where b.bmmc like '%战区%' and b.bmzt = '启用' and b.delflag = 0)

(select c.CHANN_ID,c.CHANN_NO,c.CHANN_NAME,c.AREA_ID,c.AREA_NO,c.AREA_NAME, c.CHANN_TYPE,c.AREA_MANAGE_ID,c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, a.AREA_ID_P WAREA_ID,a.AREA_NO_P WAREA_NO,a.AREA_NAME_P WAREA_NAME from BASE_CHANN c left join BASE_AREA a on a.AREA_ID=c.AREA_ID where a.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.STATE='启用' and c.DEL_FLAG=0 )

(select b.MARKETING_ACT_ID,b.MARKETING_ACT_NO,b.SPONSOR_NAME,b.MARKETING_ACT_NAME,b.MEMBER_ID, u.MARKETING_CARD_ID, u.MARKETING_CARD_NO, u.CARD_TYPE, u.CARD_VALUE, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD')CRE_TIME, u.CARD_SEQ_NO, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, b.MEMBER_ACT_DTL_ID from ERP_MARKETING_CARD u left join ERP_MEMBER_ACT_DTL b on u.MARKETING_ACT_ID=b.MARKETING_ACT_ID where u.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0 and u.STATE='启用' )

( select u.CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_ID, u.CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_NO, u.CHANN_CHECK_PLAN_NAME, p.DATA_DTL_NAME PLAN_TYPE, to_char(u.CHECK_DATE_BEG, 'yyyy-MM-DD') CHECK_DATE_BEG, to_char(u.CHECK_DATE_END, 'yyyy-MM-DD') CHECK_DATE_END, u.REMARK, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, a.ATT_PATH from ERP_CHANN_CHECK_PLAN u left join BASE_ATT a on u.chann_check_plan_id = a.from_bill_id left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL p on p.DATA_DTL_CODE = u.PLAN_TYPE )

( select * from (select a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.ADVC_ORDER_NO, a.TERM_ID, a.TERM_NO, a.TERM_NAME, a.CONTRACT_NO, a.SALE_PSON_ID, a.SALE_PSON_NAME, a.SALE_DATE, a.CUST_NAME, a.TEL, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, a.ADVC_AMOUNT, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.DEDUCTED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.RECV_ADDR, a.REMARK, sum(NVL(b.ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(b.SEND_NUM, 0)) NO_SEND_NUM from DRP_ADVC_ORDER a, DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL b where a.ADVC_ORDER_ID = b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.STATE in ('审核通过', '部分发货', '已结算') and a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.BILL_TYPE = '终端销售' group by a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.ADVC_ORDER_NO, a.TERM_ID, a.TERM_NO, a.TERM_NAME, a.CONTRACT_NO, a.SALE_PSON_ID, a.SALE_PSON_NAME, a.SALE_DATE, a.CUST_NAME, a.TEL, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, a.ADVC_AMOUNT, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.DEDUCTED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.RECV_ADDR, a.REMARK) temp left join (select c.FROM_BILL_ID, sum(NVL(d.NOTICE_NUM, 0)) NOTICE_NUM from DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ c, DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ_DTL d where c.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID = d.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID and c.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID not in (select e.FROM_BILL_ID from DRP_STOREOUT e where e.DEL_FLAG = 0 and e.STATE = '已处理') and c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by c.FROM_BILL_ID) tempa on temp.ADVC_ORDER_ID = tempa.FROM_BILL_ID where NVL(temp.NO_SEND_NUM, 0) > NVL(tempa.NOTICE_NUM, 0) )

( select distinct p.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, p.BUDGET_ITEM_ID, p.BUDGET_ITEM_NO, p.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, case when p.QUARTER ='一季度' then 1 when p.QUARTER ='二季度' then 2 when p.QUARTER ='三季度' then 3 when p.QUARTER ='四季度' then 4 end QUARTER , p.BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE, c.CHANN_ID, c.CHANN_NO, p.BUDGET_DEPT_NO, p.STATE, p.DEL_FLAG, p.YEAR, p.RELATE_AREA_ID from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA p left join BASE_CHANN c on p.Relate_Area_Id = c.Area_Id )
( select p.PRMT_PLAN_ID, p.PRMT_PLAN_NO, p.PRMT_PLAN_NAME, p.PRMT_TYPE from ERP_PRMT_PLAN p where p.del_flag = 0 and p.state = '启用' )

( select DISTINCT b.CHANN_ID, b.CHANN_NO, b.CHANN_NAME, b.CHANN_ABBR, b.CHANN_TYPE, b.CHAA_LVL, b.PERSON_CON, b.TEL, b.AREA_MANAGE_ID, b.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, b.CITY, b.CITY_TYPE, b.AREA_NAME, a.AREA_NO_P, a.AREA_ID_P, a.AREA_NAME_P, b.STATE, b.LEDGER_ID from BASE_CHANN b LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA a on b.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID where b.state='启用' and b.del_flag=0 and a.del_flag =0 )

( select DISTINCT a.AREA_ID_P, a.AREA_NO_P, a.AREA_NAME_P from BASE_CHANN b LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA a on b.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID where b.state='启用' and b.del_flag=0 and a.del_flag =0 and a.AREA_ID_P is not null )

( select c.MARKETING_CARD_NO,c.CARD_TYPE,c.CARD_VALUE,a.MARKETING_ACT_NO,a.MARKETING_ACT_NAME,c.STATE, c.CARD_SEQ_NO,c.CRE_TIME, c.MARKETING_CARD_ID,a.MARKETING_ACT_ID from ERP_MARKETING_CARD c left join ERP_MARKETING_ACT a on a.MARKETING_ACT_ID=c.MARKETING_ACT_ID where c.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.DEL_FLAG=0 )

(select c.MARKETING_CARD_NO, c.CARD_TYPE, c.CARD_VALUE, a.MARKETING_ACT_NO, a.MARKETING_ACT_NAME, c.STATE, c.CARD_SEQ_NO, to_char(c.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd') CRE_TIME, c.MARKETING_CARD_ID, a.MARKETING_ACT_ID from ERP_MARKETING_CARD c left join ERP_MARKETING_ACT a on a.MARKETING_ACT_ID = c.MARKETING_ACT_ID where c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.DEL_FLAG = 0)

( select u.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, u.BUDGET_ITEM_ID, u.BUDGET_ITEM_NO, u.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, u.BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE, u.PAR_BUDGET_ITEM_ID, u.PAR_BUDGET_ITEM_NO, u.PAR_BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, u.MONTH, u.YEAR, u.QUARTER, u.BUDGET_QUOTA, u.FREEZE_BUDGET_QUOTA, u.USE_BUDGET_QUOTA, (NVL(u.BUDGET_QUOTA,0)-NVL(u.USE_BUDGET_QUOTA,0))CURR_QUOTA, u.BUDGET_DEPT_ID, u.BUDGET_DEPT_NO, u.BUDGET_DEPT_NAME, u.RELATE_AREA_ID, u.RELATE_AREA_NO, u.RELATE_AREA_NAME, u.STATE, u.CREATOR, u.CRE_NAME, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPDATOR, u.UPD_NAME, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA u
)

(select PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, SPCL_TECH_ID, DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, SPCL_DTL_REMARK, LEDGER_ID, SPCL_TECH_FLAG, ZTXXID from T_SYS_ZTXX a left join (select p1.PRD_ID, p1.PRD_NO, p1.PRD_NAME, p1.PRD_SPEC, p1.PRD_COLOR, p1.BRAND, '' SPCL_TECH_ID, '' DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, '' SPCL_DTL_REMARK, 'NONE' LEDGER_ID, null SPCL_TECH_FLAG from BASE_PRODUCT p1 where p1.STATE in ('启用','停用') and p1.PRD_NO not like '%-%' and p1.DEL_FLAG = 0 and p1.FINAL_NODE_FLAG = 1 and p1.IS_NO_STAND_FLAG = 0
union all select p.PRD_ID, p.PRD_NO, p.PRD_NAME, p.PRD_SPEC, p.PRD_COLOR, p.BRAND, s.SPCL_TECH_ID, s.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, s.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, s.LEDGER_ID, s.SPCL_TECH_FLAG from BASE_PRODUCT p left join DRP_SPCL_TECH s on p.PRD_NO = s.PRD_NO where p.STATE in ('启用','停用') and s.PRD_NO not like '%-%' and p.DEL_FLAG = 0 and FINAL_NODE_FLAG = 1 ) temp on (a.ZTXXID= temp.LEDGER_ID or temp.LEDGER_ID='NONE') )

(select c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, a.AREA_NAME_P,a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.PROV from BASE_CHANN c left join BASE_AREA a on c.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID where c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and c.STATE = '启用' and a.STATE = '启用' and c.AREA_MANAGE_ID is not null group by a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P, a.AREA_NAME_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.PROV)

( select distinct t.OPEN_TERMINAL_REQ_ID, t.OPEN_TERMINAL_REQ_NO, t.TERM_NAME, a.AREA_ID_P AREA_ID, a.AREA_NO_P AREA_NO, a.AREA_NAME_P AREA_NAME, t.CHANN_ID_P, t.CHANN_NO_P, t.CHANN_NAME_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, t.ADDRESS, t.NATION, t.PROV, t.CITY, t.COUNTY, t.BEG_SBUSS_DATE, t.BUSS_AREA, t.SALE_STORE_ID, t.SALE_STORE_NAME, p.DATA_DTL_NAME LOCAL_TYPE, t.BUSS_SCOPE, t.RNVTN_PROP, t.TERM_NO, b.TERM_ID from ERP_OPEN_TERMINAL_REQ t LEFT JOIN BASE_CHANN c on c.CHANN_ID = t.CHANN_ID_P LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA a on t.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL p on t.LOCAL_TYPE = p.DATA_DTL_CODE LEFT JOIN BASE_TERMINAL b on b.TERM_NO = t.TERM_NO WHERE t.DEL_FLAG=0 AND c.DEL_FLAG=0 and t.STATE='审核通过' )

(select c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, a.AREA_NAME_P,a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.PROV from BASE_CHANN c left join BASE_AREA a on c.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID where c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and c.STATE = '启用' and a.STATE = '启用' and c.AREA_MANAGE_ID is not null group by c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P, a.AREA_NAME_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.PROV)
( select t.RYXXID,t.RYBH,t.XM from T_SYS_RYXX t where t.DELFLAG=0 and t.RYZT='启用' and t.ZW = '门店设计师')

( select c.TERM_ID, c.TERM_NO, c.TERM_NAME, c.DESIGN_PERSON, c.DESIGN_ID, c.CHANN_ID, c.CHANN_NO, c.CHANN_NAME, c.CHANN_RNVTN_ID, c.CHANN_RNVTN_NO, c.SALE_STORE_ID, c.SALE_STORE_NAME, c.ADDRESS, c.NATION, c.PROV, c.CITY, c.COUNTY, c.BUSS_SCOPE, c.USE_AREA, c.LOCAL_TYPE, c.RNVTN_PROP, c.PLAN_SBUSS_DATE, c.AREA_ID, c.AREA_NO, c.AREA_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, c.REIT_AMOUNT_PS from DRP_CHANN_RNVTN c where c.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.STATE = '审核通过')

( select t.*,a.AREA_ID_P,a.AREA_NO_P,a.AREA_NAME_P ,c.AREA_MANAGE_ID,c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME,c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL from BASE_TERMINAL t left join BASE_CHANN c on t.CHANN_ID_P=c.CHANN_ID left join BASE_AREA a on c.AREA_ID=a.AREA_ID)

( select distinct p.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, p.BUDGET_ITEM_ID, p.BUDGET_ITEM_NO, p.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, case when p.QUARTER ='一季度' then 1 when p.QUARTER ='二季度' then 2 when p.QUARTER ='三季度' then 3 when p.QUARTER ='四季度' then 4 end QUARTER , p.BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE, c.CHANN_ID, p.BUDGET_DEPT_NO, p.STATE, p.DEL_FLAG, p.YEAR, p.RELATE_AREA_ID from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA p LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA a ON a.AREA_ID_P = p.RELATE_AREA_ID left join BASE_CHANN c on a.AREA_ID = c.AREA_ID and p.BUDGET_DEPT_NAME = '门店建设部' )

(select t.TERM_ID, t.TERM_NO, t.TERM_NAME, t.TERM_ABBR, t.TERM_TYPE, t.TERM_LVL, t.CHANN_ID_P, t.CHANN_NO_P, t.CHANN_NAME_P, t.BEG_SBUSS_DATE, t.SALE_STORE_ID, t.SALE_STORE_NAME, t.ADDRESS, a.AREA_ID_P AREA_ID, a.AREA_NO_P AREA_NO, a.AREA_NAME_P AREA_NAME, t.STATE, t.DEL_FLAG, t.BUSS_AREA from BASE_TERMINAL t LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA a on t.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID WHERE t.DEL_FLAG=0 and a.DEL_FLAG=0 AND t.STATE='启用' )

( select u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, k.SPCL_TECH_ID, t.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, k.MAX_RETURN_NUM, k.STORE_ID, (u.PRD_ID || k.SPCL_TECH_ID)CHECKONLY, u.PRVD_PRICE RETURN_PRICE, t.SPCL_DTL_REMARK from (select a.PRD_ID, a.STORE_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, sum(NVL(a.STORE_NUM, 0) - NVL(a.FREEZE_NUM, 0)) MAX_RETURN_NUM from DRP_STORE_ACCT a group by a.PRD_ID, a.STORE_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID) k left join BASE_PRODUCT u on u.PRD_ID = k.PRD_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH t on t.SPCL_TECH_ID = k.SPCL_TECH_ID )

(select a.MARKETING_CARD_ID, a.MARKETING_CARD_NO, b.MARKETING_ACT_ID, b.MARKETING_ACT_NO, b.MARKETING_ACT_NAME, a.MOBILE_PHONE, a.CUST_NAME, a.ADDRESS, b.TERM_ID, b.TERM_NO, b.TERM_NAME, b.CHANN_ID, b.CHANN_NO, b.CHANN_NAME, to_char(b.SALE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD')SALE_DATE from ERP_CARD_SALE_ORDER_DTL a left join ERP_CARD_SALE_ORDER b on a.CARD_SALE_ORDER_ID=b.CARD_SALE_ORDER_ID where a.DEL_FLAG=0 and b.DEL_FLAG=0)

( select DISTINCT t.TERM_ID, t.TERM_NO, t.TERM_NAME, t.TERM_TYPE, t.chann_id_p CHANN_ID, t.chann_no_p CHANN_NO, t.chann_name_p CHANN_NAME, t.PERSON_CON, t.TEL, t.mobile_phone MOBILE, t.ADDRESS, t.ZONE_ID, t.DEL_FLAG, t.STATE, t.BUSS_AREA, a.AREA_ID_P AREA_ID, a.AREA_NO_P AREA_NO, a.AREA_NAME_P AREA_NAME, t.SALE_STORE_ID, t.SALE_STORE_NAME, t.LOCAL_TYPE, t.BUSS_SCOPE, c.person_con CHANN_PERSON_CON, c.tel CHANN_TEL, t.BEG_SBUSS_DATE, (t.nation || t.prov || t.city) ZONE_ADDR, t.TAX, t.BUSS_NATRUE, t.TERM_VERSION, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL AREA_MANAGE_TEL, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID AREA_MANAGE_ID from base_terminal t left join base_chann c on c.chann_id = t.chann_id_p left join base_area a on a.AREA_ID = t.AREA_ID )

(select a.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, a.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, a.REQ_ID, a.REQ_NAME, a.REQ_DATE, a.CHANN_ID, a.CHANN_NO, a.CHANN_NAME, a.AREA_ID, a.AREA_NO, a.AREA_NAME, a.AREA_MANAGE_ID, a.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, a.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, a.REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, a.BUDGET_AMOUNT, a.STATE, a.CRE_TIME, a.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, b.BUDGET_ITEM_ID, b.BUDGET_ITEM_NO, b.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, b.BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE, b.BUDGET_DEPT_ID, b.BUDGET_DEPT_NO, b.BUDGET_DEPT_NAME, b.MONTH, b.YEAR, b.QUARTER, a.LEDGER_ID, a.ORG_ID from ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ a left join ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA b on a.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID = b.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID where a.STATE='审核通过' and a.DEL_FLAG=0 and not exists (SELECT o.RELATE_ORDER_NOS FROM ERP_EXPENSE_ORDER o where o.relate_order_nos = a.prmt_cost_req_no and o.DEL_FLAG=0) )temp
( select b.BMXXID,b.BMBH,b.BMMC from t_sys_bmxx b where b.bmmc like '%战区%' and b.bmzt = '启用' and b.delflag = 0)

(select a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.ADVC_ORDER_NO,a.BILL_TYPE,a.STATE,a.DEL_FLAG,a.LEDGER_ID, a.TERM_ID,a.TERM_NO,a.TERM_NAME, a.SALE_DATE,a.SALE_PSON_ID,a.SALE_PSON_NAME,a.CUST_NAME,a.TEL,a.ORDER_RECV_DATE,a.ADVC_AMOUNT,a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT,a.DEDUCTED_TOTAL_AMOUNT,a.RECV_ADDR,abs(a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT)PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT_TEMP from DRP_ADVC_ORDER a left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER b on a.FROM_BILL_ID = b.ADVC_ORDER_ID )

( select c.CHANN_ID, c.CHANN_NO, c.CHANN_NAME, c.AREA_ID, c.AREA_NO, c.AREA_NAME, c.PERSON_CON, c.MOBILE, c.TEL, c.ADDRESS, c.ZONE_ID, c.PROV, c.CITY, c.COUNTY, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, c.DEL_FLAG, c.STATE, to_char(c.JOIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') JOIN_DATE, c.CHANN_TYPE, a.AREA_ID_P, a.AREA_NO_P, a.AREA_NAME_P, (select to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(u.TERM_NAME)) from BASE_TERMINAL u where u.CHANN_ID_P = c.chann_id) TERM_NAMES from base_chann c left join BASE_AREA a on a.AREA_ID = c.AREA_ID and a.del_flag = 0 where 1=1 )

( select c.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, c.DISTRIBUTOR_NO, c.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME, c.DISTRIBUTOR_TYPE, c.CHANN_ID, c.CHANN_NO, c.CHANN_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, c.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, c.DEL_FLAG, c.STATE, (select a.AREA_NAME_P from BASE_AREA a where a.AREA_ID = c.AREA_ID and a.del_flag = 0) AREA_NAME_P from BASE_DISTRIBUTOR c )
( SELECT s.RYXXID, s.RYBH,s.XM, t.BMMC from T_SYS_RYXX s LEFT JOIN T_SYS_BMXX t on s.bmxxid = t.bmxxid WHERE s.DELFLAG=0 AND s.RYZT='启用' and t.DELFLAG=0 AND t.BMZT = '启用')
( SELECT dis.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, dis.DISTRIBUTOR_NO, dis.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME FROM BASE_DISTRIBUTOR dis WHERE dis.state = '启用' and dis.Del_Flag = 0)
( SELECT DISTINCT c.CHANN_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_ID, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME FROM BASE_CHANN c WHERE c.DEL_FLAG=0 and c.STATE = '启用')
( SELECT dis.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, dis.DISTRIBUTOR_NO, dis.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME FROM BASE_DISTRIBUTOR dis WHERE dis.state = '启用' and dis.Del_Flag = 0)

( select a.RYXXID, a.XM, a.RYBH, a.BMXXID, a.TERM_DECT_FROM from T_SYS_RYXX a left join T_SYS_XTYH b on a.RYXXID = b.RYXXID and b.DELFLAG = 0 left join T_SYS_XTYHJS f on f.XTYHID = b.XTYHID and f.DELFLAG = 0 left join T_SYS_XTJS g on g.XTJSID = f.XTJSID and g.DELFLAG = 0 left join T_SYS_GZZCY c on c.XTYHID = b.XTYHID and c.DELFLAG = 0 left join T_SYS_GZZXX d on d.GZZXXID = c.GZZXXID and d.DELFLAG = 0 left join T_SYS_GZZQX e on e.GZZXXID = d.GZZXXID left join T_SYS_JSQX h on h.XTJSID = g.XTJSID left join T_SYS_YHQX i on i.XTYHID = b.XTYHID where a.RYZT = '启用' and a.DELFLAG = 0 and (e.XTMKID = 'FX0021301' or h.XTMKID = 'FX0021301' or i.XTMKID = 'FX0021301') group by a.RYXXID, a.XM, a.RYBH, a.BMXXID, a.TERM_DECT_FROM
)

( select DISTINCT a.AREA_NAME_P, a.AREA_ID_P, a.AREA_NO_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME from BASE_CHANN c left join BASE_AREA a on c.AREA_ID = a.AREA_ID where c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and c.STATE = '启用' and a.STATE = '启用' and c.AREA_MANAGE_ID is not null group by a.AREA_ID_P, a.AREA_NO_P, a.AREA_NAME_P, c.AREA_MANAGE_NAME )

( select * from (select a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.ADVC_ORDER_NO, a.TERM_ID, a.TERM_NO, a.TERM_NAME, a.CONTRACT_NO, a.SALE_PSON_ID, a.SALE_PSON_NAME, a.SALE_DATE, a.CUST_NAME, a.TEL, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, a.ADVC_AMOUNT, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.DEDUCTED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.RECV_ADDR, a.REMARK, sum(NVL(b.ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(b.SEND_NUM, 0)) NO_SEND_NUM, a.LEDGER_ID, sum(NVL(b.ORDER_NUM,0))ORDER_NUM, sum(NVL(b.SEND_NUM,0))SEND_NUM from DRP_ADVC_ORDER a, DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL b where a.ADVC_ORDER_ID = b.ADVC_ORDER_ID and a.STATE = '审核通过' and a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.BILL_TYPE = '终端销售' group by a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.ADVC_ORDER_NO, a.TERM_ID, a.TERM_NO, a.TERM_NAME, a.CONTRACT_NO, a.SALE_PSON_ID, a.SALE_PSON_NAME, a.SALE_DATE, a.CUST_NAME, a.TEL, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, a.ADVC_AMOUNT, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.DEDUCTED_TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.RECV_ADDR, a.REMARK, a.LEDGER_ID) temp left join (select c.FROM_BILL_ID, sum((case when c.DEAL_FLAG=0 then NVL(d.RECV_NUM, 0) else 0 end)) RECV_NUM from DRP_DST_STOREOUT c, DRP_DST_STOREOUT_DTL d where c.STOREOUT_ID = d.STOREOUT_ID and c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by c.FROM_BILL_ID) tempa on temp.ADVC_ORDER_ID = tempa.FROM_BILL_ID where temp.ORDER_NUM > NVL(tempa.RECV_NUM, 0) + NVL(temp.SEND_NUM, 0) )

( select a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, a.DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.FREEZE_NUM, a.IS_FREEZE_FLAG, a.FREEZE_STORE_ID, a.SEND_NUM, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRD_TYPE, a.REMARK, (NVL(ORDER_NUM, 0) - NVL(d.RECV_NUM,0)) NUM, NVL(d.RECV_NUM,0)RECV_NUM from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID = b.SPCL_TECH_ID and b.USE_FLAG = 1 left join (select sum(NVL(b.RECV_NUM, 0))RECV_NUM,b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID from DRP_DST_STOREOUT_DTL b left join DRP_DST_STOREOUT c on c.STOREOUT_ID = b.STOREOUT_ID where c.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by b.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID ) d on d.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID = a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID )

( select distinct p.BUDGET_QUOTA_ID, p.BUDGET_ITEM_ID, p.BUDGET_ITEM_NO, p.BUDGET_ITEM_NAME, p.BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE, c.CHANN_ID, p.BUDGET_DEPT_NO, p.STATE, p.DEL_FLAG, p.YEAR, p.RELATE_AREA_ID from ERP_BUDGET_QUOTA p LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA a ON a.AREA_ID_P = p.RELATE_AREA_ID left join BASE_CHANN c on a.AREA_ID = c.AREA_ID and p.BUDGET_DEPT_NAME = '门店建设部' )

( select a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, decode(a.PRD_TYPE,'销售货品',a.DECT_PRICE,0)DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, decode(a.PRD_TYPE,'销售货品',a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT,0)PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.FREEZE_NUM, a.IS_FREEZE_FLAG, a.FREEZE_STORE_ID, a.SEND_NUM, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRD_TYPE, sum(f.REAL_NUM)REAL_NUM, b.SPCL_DTL_REMARK from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL a left join DRP_SPCL_TECH b on a.SPCL_TECH_ID=b.SPCL_TECH_ID and b.USE_FLAG=1 left join DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ_DTL c on a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID = c.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID and c.DEL_FLAG = 0 left join DRP_ADVC_SEND_REQ d on d.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID = c.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID and d.DEL_FLAG = 0 left join DRP_STOREOUT e on e.FROM_BILL_ID = d.ADVC_SEND_REQ_ID and e.DEL_FLAG = 0 left join DRP_STOREOUT_DTL f on e.STOREOUT_ID = f.STOREOUT_ID and f.DEL_FLAG = 0 and f.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID = c.ADVC_SEND_REQ_DTL_ID group by a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID, a.PRD_ID, a.PRD_NO, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_SPEC, a.PRD_COLOR, a.BRAND, a.STD_UNIT, a.PRICE, a.DECT_RATE, a.DECT_PRICE, a.ORDER_NUM, a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ADVC_ORDER_ID, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, a.FREEZE_NUM, a.IS_FREEZE_FLAG, a.FREEZE_STORE_ID, a.SEND_NUM, a.ORDER_RECV_DATE, b.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.PRD_TYPE, b.SPCL_DTL_REMARK having sum(NVL(f.REAL_NUM, 0)) > 0 )

(SELECT E.TENDERING_ID , E.TENDERING_NO , E.PROJECT_NO , E.PROJECT_NAME , E.PROJECT_TYPE , E.TENDERING_UNIT , TO_CHAR(E.OPEN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') OPEN_TIME , E.BUDGET_AMOUNT , E.PROJECT_ADDRESS , E.CONSTRUC_PERIOD , E.PROCURE_CONTENT , E.REMARK , E. CREATOR , E.CRE_NAME , TO_CHAR(E.OPEN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') CRE_TIME , E.DEPT_ID , E.DEPT_NAME , E.CHARGE_PERSON , E.DEPOSIT, E.CONTACT_A_PERSON, TO_CHAR(E.DEPOSIT_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') DEPOSIT_EXPIRE_DATE , E.TEL from ERP_TENDERING E WHERE E.DEL_FLAG=0)

(SELECT E.PROJECT_ID, E.PROJECT_NO, E.PROJECT_NAME, E.TENDERING_ID, E.TENDERING_NO, E.PROJECT_TYPE, E.CONTRACT_UNIT, E.ADDRESS, E.CHARGE_PERSON, E.WARRANTY_PERIOD, E.START_DATE, E.SETTLE_DATE, E.SETTLE_AMOUNT, E.UNIT_FULL_NAME, E.UNIT_ADDRESS, E.BANK_ACCT, E.BANK_NAME, E.AX_BURDEN, E.REMARK, E.SAMPLE_ATT_ID, E.SAMPLE_HOUSES_ATT_ID, E.CONTRACT_SING_ATT_ID, E.PROJECT_HANDOVER_ATT_ID, E.MATERIAL_APPLY_ATT_ID, E.INSTALL_CONTRACT_SING_ATT_ID, E.GOODS_ORDER_ATT_ID, E.SEND_PRO_ATT_ID, E.VISA_ATT_ID, E.REPLENISHMENT_ATT_ID, E.SERVICE_ATT_ID, E.CREATOR, E.CRE_NAME, E.CRE_TIME, E.DEPT_ID, E.DEPT_NAME, E.DEL_FLAG, E.CHECK_ACCEPT, E.WARRANTY_AMOUNT_EXPIRE_DATE, E.STATE FROM ERP_PROJECT E WHERE E.DEL_FLAG = 0)
(SELECT E.* FROM DRP_PROBLEM_FEEDBACK E WHERE E.DEL_FLAG=0)

( select a.FLOW_ID, a.FLOW_NO, a.STATE_VAL, a.TABLE_NAME, a.INDEX_NO, a.ACTION_DESCRIBE, b.FLOW_SERVICE_ID from T_SYS_FLOW a left join T_SYS_FLOW_TRACK b on a.FLOW_NO=b.FLOW_NO and a.INDEX_NO=b.INDEX_NO left join (select d.FLOW_SERVICE_ID,max(d.INDEX_NO) INDEX_NO,d.FLOW_NO from T_SYS_FLOW_TRACK d group by d.FLOW_SERVICE_ID,d.FLOW_NO) c on b.FLOW_SERVICE_ID=c.FLOW_SERVICE_ID and a.FLOW_NO=c.FLOW_NO where b.index_no<c.index_no group by a.FLOW_ID,a.FLOW_NO,a.STATE_VAL,a.TABLE_NAME,a.INDEX_NO,a.ACTION_DESCRIBE,b.FLOW_SERVICE_ID order by a.INDEX_NO desc )
( select a.CHANN_ID, a.CHANN_NO, a.CHANN_NAME, a.CHAA_LVL, a.CHANN_TYPE, a.CHANN_NAME_P from BASE_CHANN a left join BASE_USER_CHANN_CHRG b on a.CHANN_ID = b.CHANN_ID )

( select a.FACTORY_NO, a.FROM_BILL_NO, a.BILL_TYPE, a.PERSON_CON, a.TEL, a.RECV_ADDR, a.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, to_char(a.ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')ORDER_DATE, to_char(a.PRE_RECV_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')PRE_RECV_DATE, a.RECV_CHANN_NAME, a.PRINT_NAME, a.TRANSPORT, a.TRANSPORT_SETTLE, a.PROESS_TYPE, a.CUST_NAME, a.CUST_TEL, a.CUST_ADDR, a.SALE_ORDER_ID, a.ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE, d.USER_ID, e.XTYHID, a.STATE, a.CRE_TIME from ERP_SALE_ORDER a left join ( select sum(NVL(a.ORDER_NUM, 0)) ORDER_NUM, a.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_SALE_ORDER_DTL a where a.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by a.SALE_ORDER_ID ) b on a.SALE_ORDER_ID = b.SALE_ORDER_ID left join ( select sum(NVL(a.SEND_NUM, 0)) SEND_NUM, a.SALE_ORDER_ID from ERP_SEND_ORDER_DTL a where a.DEL_FLAG = 0 group by a.SALE_ORDER_ID ) c on a.SALE_ORDER_ID = c.SALE_ORDER_ID left join BASE_USER_CHANN_CHRG d on a.CHANN_ID=d.CHANN_ID left join BASE_XTYH_LEDGER_CHRG e on e.LEDGER_ID=a.LEDGER_ID where NVL(b.ORDER_NUM, 0) > NVL(c.SEND_NUM, 0) and a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.CHANGE_FLAG != '1' )

( SELECT BC.IS_BASE_FLAG, BC.CHANN_ID CHANN_ID, BC.CHANN_NO CHANN_NO, BC.CHANN_NAME CHANN_NAME, BC.CHANN_ABBR CHANN_ABBR, bc.CHANN_ID_P, BC.CHANN_NAME_P CHANN_NAME_P, BC.AREA_NAME AREA_NAME, bc.state, BA.DELIVER_ADDR_NO DELIVER_ADDR_NO, BA.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, BA.PERSON_CON PERSON_CON, BA.TEL TEL, BA.TRANSPORT TRANSPORT FROM BASE_CHANN BC LEFT JOIN BASE_DELIVER_ADDR BA ON BC.CHANN_ID=BA.CHANN_ID where bc.del_flag=0 and bc.IS_BASE_FLAG = '0' and bc.state='启用' )
( select a.SJXMC,a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG=0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE='启用' and u.SJZDBH='SALE_TYPE') temp
